alert.note: Alert for Eastern Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 1:01AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Putnam County through 145 AM EDT... At 1256 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm over East Palatka to Lundy. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. Rainfall estimates by radar are 2 to 3 inches. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Palatka, East Palatka, Lundy, and San Mateo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
